entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or drizzle early this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
